org.sakaiproject.user.impl

Class DbUserService.DbStorage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sakaiproject.util.BaseDbFlatStorage
      • org.sakaiproject.user.impl.DbUserService.DbStorage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.sakaiproject.db.api.SqlReader, BaseUserDirectoryService.Storage
    Enclosing class:
    DbUserService

    protected class DbUserService.DbStorage
extends org.sakaiproject.util.BaseDbFlatStorage
implements BaseUserDirectoryService.Storage, org.sakaiproject.db.api.SqlReader
    Covers for the BaseXmlFileStorage, providing User and UserEdit parameters

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected class  DbUserService.DbStorage.UserWithEidReader
      Given just a BaseUserEdit object, there's no officially supported way to distinguish between a Sakai-stored user with all null metadata and a mapped user whose metadata must be obtained from a provider.

        Parameters:

        edit - The edit (may be null in a new)
